commit_msg:
Fixes bug to allow interface tests to work without TF/PyTorch installed (#385)

* Fixes bug to allow test_torch.py to work without pytorch installed

* make equivalent tf fix
author_comment: Reporter: in the test suite "QNodes were being created at the module level. This was causing exceptions if PyTorch or TensorFlow was not installed, as they were not within scope of the 'skip_if_not_installed' fixtures."
